title: Every Wish Way
description: Be careful what you wish for...Iza 's love life is a disaster. Tired of dating all the wrong men, she longs to find a nice, dependable partner to build a future with, though they're hard to come by these days. At this rate, she'd be lucky if a man just magically appeared out of thin air.To Iza's shock, a stranger with a devilishly sexy smile and an insufferably carefree attitude suddenly turns up in her flat claiming to be her personal wish-granter. Willing to play along, only if to get Beckett out of the way, she wishes to find her dream boyfriendâ€”the kind that solely exists in books.Next thing Iza knows, she's thrown into the path of a tall, dark and handsome gentleman called Darcy. Never one to let an opportunity go to waste, she decides to give love another try and sets her sights on wooing this mysterious Darcy.But with Beckett always around, helping her every step of the way, could Iza see her heart being pulled in a different direction?An unmissable enemies-to-lovers romantic comedy with a magical twist that will have you completely falling under its spell, perfect for fans of Erin Sterling and Tessa Bailey. A sparkling cocktail of humour and heart, this is for anyone who's ever dreamed of finding Mr Right and settled for Mr Right Now.
author: Shannon Bright
